content: Twitter is almost dead and I wouldn’t advise anyone to put too much effort into this social network. Despite that, there are still people using this shrinking social network which is, however, easier to automate than others. For this reason, Twitter can still be used to do online marketing provided you understand its limitations. Keep in mind that the value of a new Twitter follower is extremely close to nothing as the probability that this new follower will see your tweets in the future is very low. That’s why you need to use automation.
